Karen Baker Landers

The sound editor has been nominated to two

awards through her whole career and winning both

of them. They were The Bourne Ultimatum (2008) and

Skyfall (2013). Both awards were shared with

also sound editor Per Hallberg.

Nina Hartstone

She won Best Sound Editing in 2019 for Bohemian

Rhapsody, along with John Warhurst. She has since

not received any other nomination in this category.

Michelle Couttolenc

The sound engineer won the award for Best Sound

in 2021 for the movie The Sound of Metal, along with
